data.title: Quick C Link to C Main FLASH/DRIVE to Support C Hold / Retake
data.description: Use this FLASH/DRIVE when rotating to C to catch enemy players pushing through C Main off guard and support your team.

data.title: C Main ZERO/POINT from C Lobby Spawn Barrier
data.description: Use this ZERO/POINT lineup from the C Lobby spawn barrier to check for Defenders peeking / pushing into C Main from C Site.

data.title: Early Round ZERO/POINT + FLASH/POINT for B Site
data.description: Use this simple early round ZERO/POINT + FLASH/POINT setup to aggressively take space on B Site.
